goals: 讓使用者快速找到可參加的活動並完成報名
讓使用者清楚知道自己的報名狀態與剩餘名額
讓管理員能建立/管理活動、掌握即時報名名單並匯出
使用者登入與身分驗證（Email + 密碼）
角色權限控管（Guest / Member / Admin）
名額控管與一致性（避免超賣、取消釋放名額、狀態自動切換）
防重複（同一使用者同一活動只能報名一次；報名/取消需具備 idempotent 行為）
前後端資料一致性（含交易/原子操作、列表與詳情同步）
重要操作稽核紀錄（建立/修改/狀態變更/手動關閉報名/匯出）

source.sectionTitle: ① Global App Page State Machine

warnings: Start markers ([*]) are not present in transition.md; meta.entryStateId is inferred heuristically (Init/Idle/AppStart/Any/Ready).
Cross-diagram transitions are represented as connectors only (no cross-diagram transitions in diagrams.transitions).

Entry diagram omits states ending with 'Page' and derives invokes connectors from navigate <route>; two additional auth-related connectors are derived conservatively from to-state labels (nonstandard).
Role-specific page delta diagrams in transition.md may target a feature state (e.g. RegistrationFeature); these are represented as invokes connectors (non-navigate).
Section '⑳ 全站錯誤與權限' title normalizes to empty ASCII; diagramId falls back to 'page_20' and pageName to 'Page20'.
This dataset is intentionally minimal: spec.md is used for naming/roles/routes consistency but does not introduce extra diagrams beyond transition.md sections.
